params.description: The git repository URL to clone from.
params.name: repo-url-alternate

params.description: The build context used by Kaniko
params.name: pathToContext

params.description: git https or ssh url to clone
params.name: url

params.description: git https or ssh url to clone if not provided, url is used as default
params.name: url-alternate

params.description: git revision to checkout (branch, tag, sha, refÔÇª)
params.name: revision

params.description: (optional) git refspec to fetch before checking out revision
params.name: refspec

params.description: defines if the resource should initialize and fetch the submodules
params.name: submodules

params.description: performs a shallow clone where only the most recent commit(s) will be fetched
params.name: depth

params.description: defines if http.sslVerify should be set to true or false in the global git config
params.name: sslVerify

params.description: subdirectory inside the "output" workspace to clone the git repo into
params.name: subdirectory

params.description: clean out the contents of the repo's destination directory (if it already exists) before trying to clone the repo there
params.name: deleteExisting

params.description: git HTTP proxy server for non-SSL requests
params.name: httpProxy

params.description: git HTTPS proxy server for SSL requests
params.name: httpsProxy

params.description: git no proxy - opt out of proxying HTTP/HTTPS requests
params.name: noProxy

params.description: The image used where the git-init binary is.
params.name: gitInitImage

results.description: The precise commit SHA that was fetched by this Task
results.name: commit

results.description: The final execution status should be "Succeeded", can be replaced in > tekton v20.x
results.name: status

results.description: the pid set by the first step
results.name: lock-pid

steps.name: clone
steps.script:
# check if given alternate url starts with https
URL="https://github.com/jquad-group/cloudland2023.git"
if  echo "https://github.com/jquad-group/cloudland2023.git" | grep -E "^[[:blank:]]*http[s]{0,1}://.+$" ; then
  URL="https://github.com/jquad-group/cloudland2023.git"
fi

if  echo "$URL" | grep -v -E "^[[:blank:]]*http[s]{0,1}://.+$" ; then
  echo "Provide a valid https URI, either in url or in url-alternate"
fi

CHECKOUT_DIR="/workspace/repo/"

# Locks
TARGETDIR="/workspace/repo"
LOCKFOLDER=$TARGETDIR/.lock
PIDFILE=$LOCKFOLDER/.pid
LOGFILE=log
deleteLock(){
    pid=$(cat /tekton/results/lock-pid)
    content=$(cat $PIDFILE)
    if [ "$pid" == "$content" ];then
        echo "deleting lock"
        rm -rf $LOCKFOLDER;
    fi
}

# For exit not applicable in this use case
#trapfunctions
trap_exit() {
    echo "trapping exit signal" >&2
    deleteLock
}
trap_int() {
    echo "trapping int signal" >&2
    deleteLock
    exit 1
}
trap_term() {
    echo "trapping term signal" >&2
    deleteLock
    exit 3
}
#
#
trap trap_exit EXIT
trap trap_int  INT
trap trap_term  TERM

aquireLock(){
  mkdir -pv $TARGETDIR
  let i=1
  while ! mkdir $LOCKFOLDER ; do
      echo "waiting"
      sleep $i
      let i+=2;
      if $i >= 60 ; then
        # don't wait indefinitely
        exit 4
      fi
  done

  PID=3c57c163-eb76-415e-aff1-d962349898fa
  echo "aquired Lock"
  echo $PID > $PIDFILE
  echo $PID > /tekton/results/lock-pid
  echo $PID
  touch $LOCKFOLDER
}


cleandir() {
  # Delete any existing contents of the repo directory if it exists.
  #
  # We don't just "rm -rf $CHECKOUT_DIR" because $CHECKOUT_DIR might be "/"
  # or the root of a mounted volume.
  if [[ -d "$CHECKOUT_DIR" ]] ; then
    # Delete non-hidden files and directories
    rm -rf "$CHECKOUT_DIR"/*
    # Delete files and directories starting with . but excluding .. and .lock
    rm -rf  $CHECKOUT_DIR/.[!.]*[!lock]*
    # Delete files and directories starting with .. plus any other character
    rm -rf "$CHECKOUT_DIR"/..?*
  fi
}

aquireLock

if [[ "true" == "true" ]] ; then
  cleandir
fi
test -z "" || export HTTP_PROXY=
test -z "" || export HTTPS_PROXY=
test -z "" || export NO_PROXY=
/ko-app/git-init \
  -url "$URL" \
  -revision "main" \
  -refspec "+refs/tags/*:refs/tags/* +refs/heads/*:refs/heads/*" \
  -path "$CHECKOUT_DIR" \
  -sslVerify="false" \
  -submodules="false" \
  -depth "1"
cd "$CHECKOUT_DIR"
RESULT_SHA="$(git rev-parse HEAD | tr -d '\n')"

EXIT_CODE="$?"
# deleted by trap
# deleteLock
if [ "$EXIT_CODE" != 0 ]
then
  exit $EXIT_CODE
fi
# Make sure we don't add a trailing newline to the result!
echo -n "$RESULT_SHA" > /tekton/results/commit

workspaces.description: The git repo will be cloned onto the volume backing this workspace
workspaces.name: repo

steps.name: set-github-commit-status
steps.script:
curl \
-i \
-X \
POST \
-H \
"Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
-H \
"Authorization: Bearer ${GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN}" \
https://api.github.com \
-d \
"{\"state\":\"pending\",\"target_url\":\"http://localhost:9097/#/pipelineruns\",\"description\":\"The build is currently running.\",\"context\":\"cloudland2023/tekton-ci\"}"

steps.name: set-github-commit-status
steps.script:
curl \
-i \
-X \
POST \
-H \
"Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
-H \
"Authorization: Bearer ${GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN}" \
https://api.github.com \
-d \
"{\"state\":\"success\",\"target_url\":\"http://localhost:9097/#/pipelineruns\",\"description\":\"The build was successfull.\",\"context\":\"cloudland2023/tekton-ci\"}"
